version_description:
Version 1.3.2:
Fixed menu disappearing behind ad after a search.

Version 1.3.1:
Manual system tagging replaced by data tags.
Incursion tags added.

Version 1.3.0:
Various data filters added.
Regional map background option.
Chain won't get wiped if app is removed from memory anymore.
Fixed zoom behaviour.

Added coalition data displays (Chuggi).
Added Thera connections (Eve Scout).
Spaceblue background returned. Regional background option removed.

Faction Warfare Maps added
New data display layer: Sectors
New node option: ADM
New tag options: Stationservices, Ice occurences, Fw and Sov campaigns
Extended solarsystem info tabs by Wh, Sov, Distance to hubs
Extended Help Section
Data load fails will turn data menu icon and the failed option(s) red
Location sync fails will turn sync icon red
Location sync retries more often if eve api backend fails or times out
Download data on WiFi only option

1.4.2
Fixed station shape and some tag options not displaying on chain maps
Removed Coalition options due to api not available at the moment

1.4.0
Faction Warfare Maps added
New data display layer: Sectors
New tag options: Stationservices, Ice occurences, Fw and Sov campaigns
New node option: ADM
Extended info tabs by Wh, Sov, Hubs
Extended Help Section
Data load fails will turn data menu icon and the failed option(s) red.
Location sync fails will turn sync icon red and retry more often
WiFi only option

Trade data by eve-marketdata added
Conquerable Stations and Outposts added
Fix: Wormhole connections get removed after 48h automatically again
Fix: Thera connections can be turned off again
Fix: Trails do not turn black after 24h anymore (has been rendering connections invisible)

PI tab added
Providence map update

New Data Layer Constellation Outlines
Constellation Outline Option added for Current ingame System
Constellation Outline Data added for Cosmos / Booster / Incursions / Sov Campaigns
Tag Data added for Agents in Space / Jove Observatories
Some changes to Solarsysteminfo Tabs
zKillboard live stream

Switched API Backend (full ESI):
- you will need to re-auth you characters
- app does not check if a character is online or offline anymore
Better handling and notifying of network connection states
New backgrounds for maps (option)
Option to suppress data update notifications
Killstream fixed
minor fixes

Displaying route options added.
Fixed jumpbridge deletion bug.

new features:
- jumprange display. configure via JUMP tab in settings
- use colored dots to mark systems
- sound/vibration when docking. configure via SYNC tab in settings
changes:
- settings split to categorized tabs
- help linked via icon top left on settings' screens
- menus do not close anymore when sync gets activated
- advertisements got replaced by a static banner kindly asking for appreciation
- killboard link removed (it will return)
bugfixes:
- fixed cases where the app did not pass initial loading state
Abyssal Deadspace handling + Bugfixes
New Region Overview map

Fixed buttons sometimes not working when resuming the app
App startup improved
Info panes have a max height and are scrollable now
Tap region name in top row to goto the Region Overview map.

Kills/Pods/Npcs/Jumps sub-label option added: "Activity last hour" (all maps)
Average TCU ADM of region's sov holders (Region Overview map)
Wormhole tab on region shows all connections within region (Region Overview map)
Backend changes
Coalition options added

Trails and marks won't clear anymore after a reload
Route plotting improved
bugfix: colored marks get saved again

New layout for tablets
Save and load data option presets
All sovereignty now relates to IHUB owner
Ice systems updated

New layout for tablets
Save and load data option presets
All sovereignty now relates to IHUB owner
Ice systems updated
